channel.title: [Allstar] Message To All Player Drops From Bosses [Allstar]
channel.description:
hey i want to make my allstar say the drop they get when they kill a boss or something, unless its one of the bad drops like bones, i need to know how to make it send when they get the drop and how to make it send the name of the item they got like : [code] playerHandler.messageToAll = "+ playerName +" just got a : (itemname dropped)"; [/code]
how would i do this
NOTE *** THE SERVER BASE IS ALLSTAR/CZAR

item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

ahah im so pro XD i got it myself

Read full topic

item.title: [Allstar] Message To All Player Drops From Bosses [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @Carcool Carcool
item.description:
@Carcool wrote:

I feel you bro, its like were bros but closer

Project Insanity Code for lootshare

public void handleLootShare(Client c, int item, int amount) {
sendLootShareMessage(c.clanId, c.playerName + " has received " + amount + "x " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(item) + “.”);
}

If you need help converting, don’t tell me, just switch the : server.model.items.
to your items

Read full topic
